item.title: Capital Rx Rebrands as Judi Health After Securing $400M Investment
item.description: Capital Rx has secured a $400 million investment, including a $252 million Series F round led by Wellington Management and General Catalyst.

item.title: Dear ChatGPT: Words Matter
item.description: Don’t let LLMs hijack your style for the sake of expediency.

item.title: Trump Asks Supreme Court To Pretend It Didn’t Just Tell Him He Can’t Fire The Fed
item.description: He's only got a string of dissents and 19th century cases but those are *like* good caselaw!

item.title: Roche’s Metabolic Drug Strategy Extends to the Liver Disease MASH With $2.4B 89bio Acquisition
item.description: Roche is buying 89bio to get pegozafermin, a drug currently in two Phase 3 studies for the fatty liver disease MASH.

item.title: We’re In The Cancelling Talk Shows Phase Of Free Speech Crackdowns
item.description: We are inching closer to Fox and Friends being the only joke of a news source left on TV.
